author: cbs8
title: Introducing colormango.com - the Only Way to Source Software
text:
ColorMango.com is the new way to source software! Its estore contains a comprehensive range of cost efficient Windows & Mac Discount Apps, available to download from only 300 popular software brands worldwide. ColorMango.com continually saves businesses time and money by making sourcing software that little bit simpler.
London, UK 09/01/2015 -- ColorMango - Sourcing software out there on the jungle that is the World Wide Web can be a frustrating and infuriating task for any business. ColorMango.com recognised this issue and set up a website to provide a full range of software products at a discounted rate.
By providing this service, shoppers no longer waste valuable time hunting for the best deals because CocoMango.com has done all the hardwork. With their range of trusted suppliers, shoppers will also be protecting their computers, as there is no need to download from unreliable sources.
CocoMango.com is a cutting edge internet site far superior to anything else in the marketplace. Today, more and more people are looking for help when sourcing software and now, with CocoMango.com, many business owners and entrepreneurs will have the help they so desperately require.
The website is designed so that users can easily find their desired software through simple classified categories, again making the experience as time-efficient as possible.
In each category, is a detailed User Guide to help customers know about the products features and what they're exactly used for. The User Guide also informs of the difference between freeware and shareware so that a better choice of product can be made.
As an added bonus, ColorMango lists the best freeware of each classified category, as well as software coupons, so that shoppers no longer need to search for it via Google and the like.
About ColorMango.com
ColorMango.com was established in May 2006, (Previous name: SoftCns). It's a software online shopping store. Since its launch, ColorMango.com has built the partner relationship with over 300 popular software brands worldwide.
ColorMango offers full ranges of software products, including security, multimedia, desktop management, PDF Tools, Graphic design, development, as well as online services
